titleStmt.title: Agapai aspilai The Norfolk feast : a sermon preached at St. Dunstans in the East, upon the 18th of July, 1671, being the day of the anniversary feast for that county, for some years omitted, but now intended to be continued / by a minister of that county.
titleStmt.author: Smythies, William, d. 1715.

titleStmt.title: Agapai aspilai The Norfolk feast : a sermon preached at St. Dunstans in the East, upon the 18th of July, 1671, being the day of the anniversary feast for that county, for some years omitted, but now intended to be continued / by a minister of that county.
titleStmt.author: Smythies, William, d. 1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Nath. Ranew, and Jonath. Robinson ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Smythies by Wing.
Title proper printed in Greek letters.
"Imprimatur, Aug. 8, 1671. Rob. Grove R.P. Dno. Episc. Lond. Ã fac. Dom."--prel. pg. [1].
Reproductions of originals in Bodleian Library and Trinity College Library, Dublin.
